title: Doom and Gloom Orchestral Moods
description: A collection of 15 original orchestral track with an additional five variations, all of which portray dark and gloomy moods that are perfect for horror and suspense with an epic symphonic feel. Over fifty-two minutes of original music.
longDescription:
Preview: https://youtu.be/DFB62u2Xk34

A collection of 15 original orchestral track with an additional five variations, all of which portray dark and gloomy moods that are perfect for horror and suspense with an epic symphonic feel.

Over fifty-two minutes of original music:
1. Dark Castle: 2:15
2. Dark Chasm (bass pad only): 2:41
3. Dark Chasm: 2:41
4. Dark Throne (trailer edit): 0:34
5. Dark Throne: 2:05
6. Dusty Peak: 2:11
7. Grave of Saints: 2:08
8. Lost Bastille (with ending): 4:49
9. Lost Bastille: 4:42
10. Mysterious Cave: 2:27
11. Magic Castle (loop): 2:20
12. Magic Castle (with ending): 2:46
13. Poison Valley: 3:06
14. The Black Gulch: 2:18
15. The Cove (no intro): 1:50
16. The Cove: 2:30
17. The Gutter: 3:13
18. The Keep: 2:20
19. Undead Crypt: 2:15
20. Undead Purgatory: 1:20
technicalDetails:
20 Tracks
20 cues
50 Minutes of Music
44.1/16 .WAV files
looping (Seamless)
Developed on Unreal Engine version 4.13
